title: WHY THE HELL ARE YOU NERFING LB AND KATARINA?
body:
You just released Ekko, who already outclasses every single assassin in the game, so you nerf others and push others from viability even more? WTF is wrong with you? Ekko is an assassin himself, but he counters assassins with his ult, so you nerf LB and Kat? Good job, lmao.

Also wtf is this?
Azir soldiers no longer spam their attack animation while idle 

gtfo Riot, that was the only good thing about playing Azir.

replies.body:
Honestly ekko isn't as strong as so many people whinge about. He is good yes, but so are zed, LB, kat, he doesn't insta penta kill like a kat can. In lane, IF you have a brain, you just avoid his q and his w and he can't win a trade with you now. In team fights, just lock him down, he has his ult? chain cc him, he cannot ult while stunned.

People just need to learn to RESPECT the damage of an assassin and don't try to 1v1 them with most champions
Katarina and LeBlanc both need to be nerfed, so riot nerfed them
Ekko could do with a small nerf to his shield, even if it means buffing his damage slightly.

LeBroken is gay af to play against and Kat could burst you down without her ult.

Those nerfs were completely justified.
Once again Bipolar talks shit and nobody fucking cares.
